sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od g.yas phyogs su 'phro ba'i me tog rin po che'i lhab lhub kyis brgyan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin mngon par 'thon pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos rnam par dag pa ste/ bskal pa thams cad du rnam par thar pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of true awakening, adorned with flowers of mixed jewels, the jewel flowers all emitting light beams in all of which there are buddhas sitting on the site of enlightenment, filling boundless worlds, causing the worlds to be purified, putting an end to all deluded thoughts. This is the twelfth.

sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sems kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer dam pa rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyan du mtshan rnam par bkod pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin la snang ba shin tu 'byung zhing ye shes kyi sku dang / chos kyi skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su khyab pa'i sprin dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi 'od ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called clouds of radiance of light, adorned by crystallizations of the sovereign faculty of mind from the oceanic treasury of jewel flames, radiating great beams of light in which appear countless enlightening beings and the deeds they carry out, the body of knowledge, the body of realities, and the ocean of physical forms of all buddhas, filling the cosmos. This is the thirteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i gzhi/ me tog dang ldan pa'i bai DUr+ya kun tu snang bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur te/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas par 'gengs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo'i 'od kyi rgyan thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khebs par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nga ros chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa'i mtshan rgya mtshos thams cad du brgyan pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called clouds of adornments shining in all directions, arrayed with diamond flowers and lapis lazuli, radiating great beams of light in which there are great jewel lotus blossom thrones, fully adorned, covering the cosmos, spontaneously expounding the practices of enlightening beings, the sound pervading the ocean of all universes. This is the fourteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i gzhi gangs chen mtsho thams cad kyi rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan tshad med pa thugs skad cig gis yang dag par ston cing / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gengs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called manifestation of the clusters of practices of the ocean of concentration of buddhas, instantly revealing the infinite adornments of Buddha, adorning the inconceivable oceans of worlds in all universes. This is the fifteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pad+mo'i gzhi dang / rgyan gyi me tog ri rab rgya mtsho'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzhi sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las byung ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i 'od kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called clouds of universal illumination of the ocean of mystic projections, adorned by mountainous lotus blossoms of exquisite jewels, the light of the jewels born from the vows of the Buddha, manifesting mystical projections without end. This is the sixteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dpal rin po che dri ma med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri dang / rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan khong na srel cing / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i gzhi rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of liberations of all buddhas, adorned by pure fine jewels, emanating great lights, adorning all buddhas’ lion thrones, showing images of forms of all buddhas, as well as the infinite Buddha teachings and the ocean of buddha-lands. This is the seventeenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bai DUr+ya rin po che'i me tog dang / gser gyi pad+mo las chos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sgron ma ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rnam par dag pas snang ba'i rgyan bstan pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du dmigs shing rnam par bkye bas tha mi dad cing sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i rin po che'i sprin dang / rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i ri/ 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing / chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phrul pas snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of illumination of independent means, adorned by lapis lazuli flowers, gold lotus blossoms, crystal lamps, and multitudes of flames of sublime teachings, emanating pure light from dense clouds of jewel flames of all buddhas, filling the cosmos, showing therein all the fine items of adornment. This is the eighteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa rin po che'i 'od zer sna tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan cing rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi nyi ma shin tu gsal ba dang / ye shes kyi 'od kyi chos rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par dag pa'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of awareness of the lineage of buddhas, adorned by infinite jewel lights with a thousand spheres, thoroughly pure within and without, born of roots of goodness of the past, those lights illuminating the worlds of the ten directions, kindling the sun of knowledge, spreading the ocean of truths. This is the nineteenth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i phreng ba rnam par bkye ba dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od du 'phro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od seng ge rnam par snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rdul gcig las sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du yang dag par 'phro bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dag par ston cing de'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of manifestation of all buddhas’ freedom of form, adorned by necklaces of all jewels and lapis lazuli flowers, unfolding great jewel flames, filling the cosmos, manifesting therein the measureless buddhas of past, future, and present, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, bold and fearless as majestic lions, replete with all the marks and knowledge of buddhahood. This is the twentieth.

sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de kho na thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid rin po che'i rgyan rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snying po tshad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i 'od la 'jug pa zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud illuminating the entire cosmos, adorned by the purity of the precious characteristics of the enlightened, radiating great lights illuminating the cosmos, revealing the sublime treasury of knowledge of all the infinite buddhas and enlightening beings. This is the twenty-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DUr+ya'i me tog dang / seng ge'i zla ba 'od zer rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa kun tu snyoms par dpal gyi sprin gyis/ chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer snang bas/ zhing dang 'jig rten mang por de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cluster of features of Vairocana Buddha, adorned by flowers of the finest jewels as well as pure moons of jewels, all radiating countless trillions of crystal lights, filling all space and the cosmos, therein manifesting countless buddha-lands with buddhas sitting in them. This is the twenty-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyis kun tu rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi sprin phyogs bcur bkye ba kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of light revealing all buddhas, adorned with beautiful lamps of myriad jewels, emitting pure light illumining all worlds in the ten directions, showing all the buddhas teaching. This is the twenty-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i na bun gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par ston cing / rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of manifestation of all adornments, embellished by all kinds of jewel flames, radiating pure light filling the cosmos, in every successive instant constantly manifesting all the untold, unspeakable numbers of buddhas and enlightening beings sitting at sites of enlightenment. This is the twenty-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rgya mtsho dang; spos yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rin po che'i dra ba rab tu 'phel bas sems can gyi khams kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad sgrog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud producing the sounds of all universes, adorned with oceans of jewels and finest sandalwood, emitting great webs of flames filling the cosmos, producing therein subtle sounds pointing out the ocean of all actions of sentient beings. This is the twenty-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yongs su dag pas/ zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu snang ba rnam par bkod pa'i phyir chos rgya mtsho'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi sna tshogs kun tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa mang po kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud reflecting the spheres of mystical projections of all buddhas, adorned by the pure eyes of the enlightened, illuminating all worlds with light, in which appear all the adornments of the buddhas of past, future, and present, and producing sublime sounds expounding the inconceivably vast ocean of truth. This is the twenty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bsgrubs pa mi mnga' ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du bzhugs pa'i 'od rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of light illumining the ocean of buddhas, that light illuminating all worlds in the cosmos without obstruction, with a buddha sitting in each. This is the twenty-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul mang po chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin kun tu mched pa dang / rin po che'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cluster of jewel lamps, emitting the far-reaching light of the enlightened, illuminating all universes in the ten directions, showing therein all buddhas, enlightening beings, and the ocean of inconceivable numbers of various beings. This is the twenty-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ye shes kun tu yangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / chos rgya mtsho'i lam tshad med pa dang / zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba sems can gyi rgyud thams cad kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyis zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa'i nga ros sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi kun gyi mthar thug cing thams cad mngon par mkhyen pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi kun tu thug par 'byung ba'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of nondifferentiation of the realm of reality, radiating the light of great knowledge of the enlightened, illuminating all the buddha-lands of the ten directions, all the enlightening beings, the congregations at the sites of enlightenment, and the infinite ocean of teachings, manifesting therein all kinds of miraculous powers, and also emitting sublime voices explaining the undertakings of Universally Good enlightening beings according to the inclinations of sentient beings, causing them to dedicate themselves to Universal Good. This is the twenty-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rin po che snang ba'i sprin yid du 'ong ba/ snying po byang chub kyi gzugs brnyan yongs su ston par mngon par 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par ston pa'i sprin kun tu bkye bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sprin gyi 'od du gnas pa zhes bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called clouds of radiant illumination abiding in the oceans of all worlds, emanating jewel lights filling all universes in space, revealing therein immaculate sites of enlightenment as well as the physical forms of buddhas and enlightening beings, causing those who see to attain objectless vision. This is the thirtieth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor 'od kun tu snang ba tshad med pa ston pas byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / gzi chen pos chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi kun tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po ltar 'od kun nas 'byung ba yongs su grub ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi sprin dang / 'od kyi rgyan phyogs thams cad snang bas rnam par snang bar byung zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu 'phel ba'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa'i sprin gyi phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dra ba dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin ces bya bamnga' ba dang /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of flames of pure light of all jewels, emitting the pure light of the exquisite jewels of the infinite buddhas and enlightening beings, illuminating all universes in the ten directions, revealing all the oceans of enlightening beings therein, all imbued with the spiritual power of the enlightened, forever traveling through the network of all lands in space. This is the thirty-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor dbu'i gtsug nas mtho ba/ rim gyis mngon par 'phags shing 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / rin po che'i tshon gyis kha dog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od dang ldan par gyur pa; gser gyi thig le dri ma med pa'i mig 'phrul gyis kun nas shin tu brgyan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa'i sprin gyis kun tu rgyas par khyab cing / zhing gi dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur bas zhing gi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su gyur pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rgyan du gyur cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur ba'i sprin snang ba zhes bya bamnga' ba'o/ /

“Next there is a mark of greatness called cloud of illumination of the arrays of all universes; it is right in the middle, at the crest of a gradual rise, adorned with a pure gold cosmic net, emanating clouds of pure light filling the cosmos, instant after instant constantly showing the buddhas, enlightening beings, and congregations at the sites of enlightenment in all worlds. This is the thirty-second.

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'od rab tu snang ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi mdog ltar snang ba nyi ma dang zla ba ltar snang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas/ phyogs bcur 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer 'byung ba/ 'od kun tu snang ba/ dpal kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas shing / rin po che'i sprin chen po shin tu 'gyed pa/ phyogs kyi 'khor thams cad du rnam par snang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi sgra/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu 'phags pa'i mar me rab tu snang bas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog kun tu rgyas shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya bamnga' ba'o/ /

“The top of Buddha’s head is embellished with these thirty-two marks of great people. Between the Buddha’s eyebrows is a mark of great people called cloud of light permeating the cosmos, adorned with jewel flowers, emanating great beams of light containing the hues of all jewels, clear and pure as the light of the sun and moon, that light illumining the lands of the ten directions, revealing the bodies of all buddhas therein, and also emitting sublime sounds expressing the ocean of truths. This is the thirty-third mark.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs sems can gyi khams su chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pas grub pa/ 'od 'phro ba'i sprin rin po che dngul gyi mdog tu kun tu ston pas rnam par 'phrul ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s eyes have a mark of greatness called cloud of independent universal vision, adorned by many beautiful jewels, their crystalline light pure and clear, seeing all without any obstruction. This is the thirty-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su dag pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang / mchog dang kha dog dang / ldan par gyur pa de bzhin thugs su chud pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyis kun tu rgyas shing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang; sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s nose has a mark of greatness called cloud of knowledge of all spiritual powers, adorned by pure jewels, covered with lights the colors of all jewels, wherein appear infinite phantom buddhas sitting on jewel lotus blossoms, going to all worlds, expounding to all enlightening beings and all sentient beings the inconceivable ocean of all aspects of buddhahood. This is the thirty-fifth.

sangs rgyas kyi ljags yangs pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ljags yangs pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su grub pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gzhi las 'od 'phros pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par snang bar mdzad pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan thams cad shin tu ston pa'i gsung dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi ljags yangs pa'i sgro rin po che thams cad / kha dog dang / mdog gis rab tu brgyan pa 'od zer rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang ba/ bzhad mo 'dzum pas phyogs bcur rab tu bkye zhing 'gro ba thams cad shin tu dang ste/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sna tshogs rnam par dag pa rab tu brjod cing / shin tu rgya che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ bskal pa tshad med par sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sgra 'byin pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa thams cad du nga ro yangs pa 'byin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dbyangs shin tu sgrog cing / snang ba yang dag par ston pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s tongue has a mark of greatness called cloud manifesting reflected images of sound, adorned by beautiful jewels of all colors, produced by the roots of goodness of former times; his tongue’s length and breadth covers all oceans of worlds; whenever the Buddha smiles, he emits lights of all jewels that illumine all the universes in the ten directions, causing all minds to become clear and cool; all the buddhas of past, future, and present appear clearly in the lights, all uttering far-reaching, subtle sounds pervading all lands and remaining for infinite eons. This is the thirty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi 'og gi drung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs thams cad ltar snang zhing mdzod spu yongs su 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu/ rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu nas btang ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sbubs can ljags kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul gyi mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The buddha’s tongue has another mark of greatness called cloud of reality realms. It is perfectly flat, adorned with jewels, radiating exquisite jewel lights complete with colors and characteristics like the lights emanating from the hair between the Buddha’s eyebrows. Those lights illumine all buddha-lands, showing them to be only made of atoms, having no intrinsic essence. In the lights there also appear countless buddhas, all uttering subtle messages explaining all truths. This is the thirty-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi rtse mo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od 'phro bas/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dbyings thams cad du snang zhing / yid du 'ong ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po'i dbyangs kyi yan lag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgrog cing gsung snyan pa'i ro myong bas/ sems can la go bar mdzad cing bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par mnyan du yod par dbyangs kyi yan lag gi sgra yang dag par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad la yid du 'ong ba'i chos su snang bas chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The tip of Buddha’s tongue has a mark of greatness called cloud of light illuminating the cosmos, adorned with wish-fulfilling jewels, always spontaneously producing golden flames wherein appear reflections of the ocean of all buddhas. It also causes subtle sounds to resonate, filling all the boundless worlds, each sound containing all sounds, and explaining the sublime truth, to the joy of the hearers, who appreciate for measureless eons without forgetting. This is the thirty-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi rtse mo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa na bzhugs pa'i gsung rin po che'i rgyal bas kun nas brgyan cing sna tshogs su gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi klong du bsngags pa rab tu 'jug pa rnam par phye ba gzhan dang gzhan du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kun nas yog par sangs rgyas kyi gsung la byang chub sems dpa' 'dzud cing / zhing thams cad du rin po che'i rgyal po sgo kun nas ston pas/ chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The tip of Buddha’s tongue has another mark of greatness, called cloud lighting up the cosmos, adorned with diamonds, emanating subtle lights of myriad colors, filling infinite lands of the ten directions throughout the cosmos, all pure, all containing infinite buddhas and enlightening beings, such uttering all kinds of sublime messages, received in person by all enlightening beings. This is the thirty-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi rkan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan in+d+ra nI la sna tshogs dang bai DUr+ya'i dbyibs kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ phyogs thams cad du rin po che'i 'od 'phro zhing dri ma med pa byung bas/ rnam par snang ba'i spos kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyi khongs su/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par snang bas/ zhing rgya mtsho'i ming du bya ba thams cad du rnam par 'phrul ba'i tshul la rab tu gnas shing chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid yang dag par ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s gums have a mark of greatness called cloud showing the inconceivable realm of reality, adorned with sapphires and lapis lazuli, emanating clouds of pure light from flames of fragrant lamps, filling the cosmos, showing all kinds of means of mystic powers, expounding the profound, inconceivable truth everywhere in all oceans of worlds. This is the fortieth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g.yas kyi 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'od rin po che'i mtshan gyi rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od zer snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba rin po che rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'od gsal bas 'od kyi dra ba kun tu bkye ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sems can du gtogs pa thams cad la bkra shis dang / 'khor lo rnam pa kun tu mdzes pas/ rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s lower right teeth have a mark of greatness called cluster of teeth of Buddha, adorned with jewels set in gammadion patterns, radiating great beams of light illuminating the cosmos, with all buddha-bodies appearing therein, circulating throughout the ten directions, enlightening sentient beings. This is the forty-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g.yas pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje spos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin kun tu snang ba'i 'od zer rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i snying po can chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis klog pa rin po che'i 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer re re'i khongs su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chud par ston pa/ zhing thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin kun du nar cing mched pas 'od kyi sprin rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba ri rab kyi snying po can zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s upper right teeth have a mark of greatness called clouds of high banks of jewel flames, adorned with treasuries of jewels, emitting pure light of indestructible fragrant flames, each light ray filling the cosmos, showing the spiritual powers of all buddhas, and also showing the pure sites of enlightenment in all worlds in the ten directions. This is the forty-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g.yon pa 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu ston pas spos dang / rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i me tog sna tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang ba kun tu 'phro ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i sprin yang dag par bstan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu gsal bas rnam par snang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dri ma med pa la bzhugs pa'i sprin/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi ri rab kyi mar me rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s lower left teeth have a mark of greatness called clouds of radiant illumination from jewel lamps, adorned with all kinds of beautiful jewels emitting flowers and scents, emanating pure light from clouds of lamp flames, filling all oceans of worlds, revealing therein all buddhas sitting on lotus blossoms surrounded by enlightening beings. This is the forty-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g.yon pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od sna tshogs kun nas rnam par dag pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi rin po che'i rgyud kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo dang / rin po che'i me tog shin tu snang ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs yongs su 'khyil ba; chos kyi dbyings su gsung sgrog cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par mdzad cing / nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin zad mi shas pa kun tu mched par 'gyed pas/ chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / rin po che thams cad kyi tshen du snang ba'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbyings las gsung gi sgra 'byin pa/ chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin du snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s upper left teeth have a mark of greatness called cloud reflecting the enlightened ones, adorned with gold of pure brilliance, nets and flowers of jewels, emanating great spheres of flames filling the cosmos, revealing therein all the buddhas using their spiritual powers in space to distribute the milk of the Teaching, the lamps of the Teaching, the treasure of the Teaching, to educate all groups of enlightening beings. This is the forty-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems kyi mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tshems kyi mtshams thams cad na mtshan gcig par me tog gi mtshan dang / rgya mtsho'i sgo'i mtshan gyi sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dal ba las/ rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed cing / bzhad mo 'dzum pas sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab par rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho'i khongs su chud pa'i snying po can gyis sangs rgyas kyi tshems kyi mtshams thams cad rgyas par gang bas/ skad cig tu 'od kyis rgyas par kun tu rgyu ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kun tu 'gyed pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s front teeth have a mark of greatness called cloud of omnipresent light; between each tooth are arrays of oceans of marks that all radiate light when the Buddha smiles, with crystal flames of the colors of all jewels, swirling to the right, circulating throughout the cosmos, uttering the voice of Buddha, explaining the practice of Universal Good. This is the forty-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgros la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / 'od ltar snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mdangs rab tu snang bas dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / mdangs kyi kun tu khyab par rnam par snang zhing / gser dang / pad+mo'i mdog yongs su dag pas kun tu sbyangs pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi mdangs dang / mdog tu snang ba mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mgur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dung gi mgur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od lam me/ lam mer yongs su snang bas/ mdog shin tu gsal zhing / gzhi thams cad rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par snang bar byas pas/ phyogs thams cad du rnam par gsal ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s lips have a mark of greatness called cloud reflecting lights of all jewels, radiating immense beams of light the color of rose gold, of lotuses, and the colors of all jewels, illumining the cosmos and completely purifying it. This is the forty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g.yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang / gser gyi kha dog rab tu 'phel bas pad+ma'i mdog rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi dra ba rab tu snang ste/ kun tu gsal bar chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khongs su chud pa'i sprin rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas rab tu mang po thams cad snying por byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi gzhi dang ldan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s neck has a mark of greatness called cloud shining on all worlds, adorned by diamonds. His neck is supple, soft, slender, and moist, and gives off radiant pure light filling all worlds in the ten directions, revealing all buddhas therein. This is the forty-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shin tu 'phags shing / yongs su rgyas la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi 'od dang; mdog yongs su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo rab tu snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po mchog tu kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s right shoulder has a mark of greatness called Buddha’s immense cloud of all jewels, emanating lights of the colors of all jewels, gold, and lotus blossoms, forming a network of crystal flames, illuminating the cosmos, revealing all enlightening beings therein. This is the forty-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g.yon pa la sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i mdzod spu'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gzhi las/ rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba sna tshogs shin tu bsgrubs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / pad+mo'i mdog ltar gsal zhing bzang ba rab tu bkye bas/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu rin po che'i sprin gyi 'od rab tu snang ba bkye bas/ dpal rab tu 'bar zhing chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

The Buddha’s right shoulder has another mark of greatness, called cloud of supreme jewels shining radiantly, pure as gold in color, emanating crystal light filling the cosmos, revealing all enlightening beings therein. This is the forty-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g.yas pa'i lhun la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba rin po che'i go cha/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser lta bu/ dpal thams cad kyis rgyas pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i 'od rnam par snang ba/ rin po che'i me tog spos kyi 'od 'phro bas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rgyan rnam par phye bas brgyan te/ kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s left shoulder has a mark of greatness called cloud of supreme light illuminating the cosmos, variously adorned like the marks on his crown and between his eyebrows, emitting golden, lotus-colored, and jewel-colored lights forming great networks of flames filling the cosmos, showing therein all occult powers. This is the fiftieth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g.yon pa'i lhun la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i phung po'i sprin chos kyi dbyings kun tu rab tu mched pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su khyab cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i rgyan du gyur par kun tu mched cing snang ba'i dbyings kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

The Buddha’s left shoulder has another mark of greatness, called cloud of light shining everywhere, whirling to the right, adorned with gold and diamonds, radiating lights of fragrant flames of flowers of jewels, filling the cosmos, showing all buddhas and all purified lands therein. This is the fifty-first.

sangs rgyas kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan nyid rgya mtshos kun tu brgyan pas rab tu 'jam pa'i gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi mdog lta bur snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshad du 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'khyil bas yongs su dag cing / chos rgya mtsho'i gsung dbyangs dang ldan pa; rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas rnam par brgyan te/ rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mtshan gyi dbyings rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i dpal rgya mtsho kun gyi gzhung gi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/

The Buddha’s left shoulder has another mark of greatness, called cloud of universal radiance, whirling to the right, with subtle mysterious adornments, emitting pure light from clouds of flames of buddhas’ lamps, filling the cosmos, revealing the various adornments of all enlightening beings therein, all superbly beautiful. This is the fifty-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i g.yas phyogs 'dab chags na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo snang ba'i gzhi'i rgyan/ rin po che'i mig 'phrul gyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyi lhun dri ma med pas rab tu snang zhing / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'od rnam par snang ba/ dpal gyi be'u dang mtshams sbyor ba rab tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s chest has a mark of greatness shaped like a gammadion called oceanic cluster of auspicious signs, adorned with crystal jewel flowers emitting all kinds of orbs of light flames of the colors of all jewels, filling the cosmos, making it all pure, and also producing marvelous sounds expressing the ocean of the teachings. This is the fifty-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i 'dab chags g.yon phyogs na byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i cod pan la snang ba shin tu 'phags pa'i sprin gyi lhun dri ma med pas thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston cing / chos rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rab tu ston pas; 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“To the right of the mark of auspicious signs is a mark of greatness called cloud of revelation of light, adorned by the cosmic net of Indra, radiating a vast circle of light filling the cosmos, revealing therein infinite buddhas. This is the fifty-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i g.yas phyogs kyi 'og rol 'dab chags na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i mdzod spus rab tu brgyan pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa/ pad+mo'i dbyibs 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pas/ me tog rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the right of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud manifesting the Buddha everywhere, adorned by the jewel crowns of enlightening beings, emanating great lights shining on all worlds in the ten directions. Purifying them all, showing therein the buddhas of past, future, and present sitting on the sites of enlightenment, manifesting spiritual powers, and widely expounding the ocean of teachings. This is the fifty-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i g.yon phyogs [*phyogs?] gyi 'og rol gyi 'dab chags na rin po che thams cad kyi 'od sems kyi rgyal po'i snying po can rin po che'i rgyal po'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo dang / 'od rab tu bkye bas/ kun tu dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags pa'i khongs su sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i phung po ma lus par chud pa'i snying po can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gser rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the right of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of blooming flowers, adorned by crystal jewel flowers, radiating pure light rays from precious lamps of fragrant flames, shaped like lotus blossoms, filling the world. This is the fifty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i rtse mo la nam mkha'i dbyings su rin po che'i sgron ma/ spos rin po che'i rgyal po lus thams cad la snying po byang chub kyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar zhing / bai DUr+ya'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgron ma la spos kyi phreng bas phyogs yangs pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / kun tu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal gyi be'u rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the right of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of pleasant golden color, adorned by diamonds from the Mind King treasury of all jewels, emanating pure light illuminating the cosmos, revealing therein immensely radiant jewel treasuries like the eyes of Buddha. This is the fifty-seventh.

de'i 'og na rjes su 'gro ba'i dpal gyi be'u gnyis pa yod pa'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mtshan nyid kyi pad+mo'i gzhi la ze ba byang chub sems dpa' g.yas phyogs su 'khor bar 'khod pa rab tu snang bas shin tu 'phags shing yongs su dag la/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtshor gsung sgrog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi phung po'i snying po can/ rin po che'i rgyal pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i 'od rab tu 'bar bas 'od zer rnam par snang ba'i 'od kyi lhun dang ldan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the right of the mark of auspicious signs, called cluster of oceans of buddhas, adorned by gems, fragrant lamps, and flower garlands, emanating the pure light of great flames of fragrant lamps of diamond, filling space, pervading all lands, showing the assemblies at the sites of enlightenment there. This is the fifty-eighth.

rjes su 'gro ba'i dpal gyi be'u gsum pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan rgya mtshos yongs su gang ba'i rin po che rgya mtsho'i nang na/ zhing thams cad gzugs brnyan du 'khod par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gzhan dang gzhan mngon par phyung bas chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i sprin kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“To the left of the mark of auspicious signs there is a mark of greatness called clouds of light of revelation, adorned with countless enlightening beings sitting on jewel lotus blossoms, emanating jewel-flame light beams, studded with diamonds, purifying all oceans of universes, revealing therein infinite buddhas and their sublime voices expounding all truths. This is the fifty-ninth.

rjes su 'gro ba'i dpal gyi be'u bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyan thams cad snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'od rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer snang ba phun sum tshogs pas rgyas par snang ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i nyi ma rnam par snang ba dang / phreng ba kun tu byung zhing 'phags pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the left of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of light appearing throughout the cosmos, adorned by an ocean of jewels, emitting great light pervading all worlds, showing the enlightening beings therein. This is the sixtieth.

dpal gyi be'u de'i 'og rol na chos thams cad kyi sgron ma'i dbyings dri ma med pa spos kyi me tog gi 'od zer rab tu snang ba/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi thugs su 'dus pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho las/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo'i klong thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi sprin 'byin pa zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the left of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of universal eminence, adorned with garlands of jewel orbs made of diamonds that shine like the sun, emanating great flames of light filling all oceans of worlds in the cosmos, showing therein all worlds, all buddhas, and all sentient beings. This is the sixty-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u bcu pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pas mthu phyung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi 'od yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho'i klong yongs su dag pa thams cad kyis zhing rgya mtsho rab tu brgyan cing klubs te/ rnam par 'god pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the left of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of the sublime sound of the turning of the wheel of the Teaching, adorned by lamps of all truths and flowers of pure fragrance, emitting great beams of light filling the cosmos, revealing therein the ocean of marks and ocean of mind of all the buddhas. This is the sixty-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ dbus rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin po che'i 'od zer rnam par gsal ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba chos kyi dbyings su 'bar zhing 'khor lo g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i gzungs rnam par snang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od dang / dpal gyis rgyas par gang ba'i 'od zer rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba sna tshogs thams cad lta bur 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi rgyan gyi sprin du snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“There is another mark of greatness to the left of the mark of auspicious signs, called cloud of adornments, adorned by the ocean of all buddhas of past, future, and present, radiating immaculate light purifying all buddha-lands, showing therein all the buddhas and enlightening beings as well as the deeds they carry out. This is the sixty-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rin po che la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung bas nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan cing / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsung 'jig rten thams cad du sgrog pa rgya mtshos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho yang dag par brjod pa rgya mtsho'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The Buddha’s right hand has a mark of greatness called cloud of oceanic illumination, adorned by myriad jewels, constantly emitting pure light like the aura of the moon, filling all worlds in space, emanating thunderous voices extolling all the practices of enlightening beings. This is the sixty-fourth.

sangs rgyas kyi phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i me tog bai DUr+ya dang / in+d+ra nI las brgyan pa g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ pad+mo'i snying po can/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che'i phung po mchog la gnas pa'i 'od/ phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings byang chub kyi shing rnam par bkod pas brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sprin la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i 'od snang ba mi g.yo ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud or reflected radiance, adorned with flowers of lapis lazuli and sapphires, shedding great light illuminating all the worlds in the ten directions where enlightening beings abide, their troves of lotus blossoms, jewels and so on, therein showing the infinite buddhas sitting at the enlightenment tree with the pure body of reality, causing all the lands of the ten directions to quake. This is the sixty-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i rlabs kyi 'od rnam par snang bas / phyogs thams cad du sprul pa'i dra ba'i 'od kyi sprin rab tu bkye ste/ chos thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pas/ shin tu 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i tshogs las rab tu mchod pa'i 'od zer snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng bas kun tu brgyan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud of lamp flame garlands adorning everywhere, arrayed with radiant jewels, emitting great beams of light forming networks of miraculous displays of mystical emanations, showing therein hosts of enlightening beings, all wearing jeweled crowns, expounding the ocean of enlightening practices. This is the sixty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i 'od kyi gzhi las blangs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po can gyi sprin/ sangs rgyas pad+mos yongs su khyab pa'i mdog gi me tog shin tu rgyas pas pad+mo'i 'od zer rin po che rab tu snang ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang bar rin po che'i sprin rab tu bstan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud revealing all jewels, adorned with lamps with lotuslike flames, emitting oceanic treasuries of light pervading the cosmos, showing therein infinite buddhas sitting on lotus thrones. This is the sixty-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho/ chos kyi dbyings su bsod nams kyi snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ me tog 'od 'phro ba rin po che ltar snang ba shin tu ston pas rab tu 'phags shing zhing gi dra ba la 'jug pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi gzhi kun tu gsal bar rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud of light, adorned with oceans of crystal flames, emitting flames of all jewels and flames of flowers of fragrant fire, their pure light filling all networks of worlds, showing all buddhas’ sites of enlightenment therein. This is the sixty-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis rin po che'i mdog tu byas te/ kun tu snang bar brgyan pa'i 'od dang / rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad dang / thugs skad cig la zhal mngon par bstan pa; sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis gser gyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ba rnam par dag pa bai DUr+ya'i sgron ma'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left hand has a mark of greatness called cloud of lamps of jewel-like purity, adorned with the colors of precious elements, radiating light of the golden hue of the Buddha, moment to moment constantly causing all the finest adornments to appear. This is the sixty-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mig 'phrul gyi dra ba'i mdog /rdo rje'i me tog kun nas yid du 'ong bas rab tu brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dbyings kyi shin tu spras pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul mkhyen pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud of voices of the lamp of knowledge of all lands, adorned with diamond flowers in a cosmic net, radiating pure golden light illumining all worlds in the ten directions. This is the seventieth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan / rin po che'i me tog gi mtshon gyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa/ rin po che'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pas pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud of light resting on a precious lotus, adorned with exquisite flowers of all precious substances, emanating great light, like a mountainous lamp, lighting all the worlds of the ten directions. This is the seventy-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i sprin stug po glog gi phreng ba kun nas 'gyur bar rab tu 'dal ba/ zhing thams cad du snang zhing pad+mo'i snying po can gyi gdan la sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gser gyi gzhi la rab tu snang ba'i mig 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas mang po'i phyag gis mtshan gyi rgyud thams cad bstan pas/ phyogs kyi klong thams cad du 'khor lo dang / mdzod dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / rin po che kun tu bkram pa dang / bkra shis kyis kun tu brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gsal ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left hand has another mark of greatness, called cloud of universal illumination of the cosmos, adorned with a cosmic net of jewel garlands, jewel discs, and jewel vases, as well as myriad sublime appearances, emitting great light illumining all lands in the ten directions, showing therein all buddhas of all oceans of worlds in all universes, sitting on lotus blossoms. This is the seventy-second.

sangs rgyas kyi phyag g.yas pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan nyid rin po che yongs su dag pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chu'i zla ba lta bur snang ba'i 'od kyi phung po'i snying po can/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyid kyis gzhi rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi 'dab ma'i mdog dang tshon du snang bas/ rin po che thams cad kyi sgra mkhyen pa dang / zhing yongs su ston pas bskal pa dang / zhing gi klong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right fingers have a mark of greatness called cloud showing the whirlpool of lands of all ages, adorned with flowers of all the finest jewels from treasuries of the glow of the moon reflected in the water, emanating great beams of light filling the cosmos, constantly producing therein subtle sound filling the lands of the ten directions. This is the seventy-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yon pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par bkye ba'i rin po che'i mdzod/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klong thams cad du snang ba rin po che'i rgyal po mang po'i sprin mched de byung bas/ phyag sor gyi mtshan gyi gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel ba la/ in+d+ra nI la dang / rdo rje shin tu brtan pa'i rin po che'i sprin gyi tshon sna tshogs rin po che 'od 'phro bar rnam par snang zhing chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pas rnam par snang bar byang chub rgya mtsho thams cad khongs su chud cing / kun tu mched pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sgra phyag gi mthil nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du go bar mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu snang zhing / sems yang dag par bskul ba dang / smon lam gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'od rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzhi nyi ma la sbyin pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phel bas/ rnam par snang bar byas shing sprul pa chos kyi dbyings su snang ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left fingers have a mark of greatness called cloud resting on all jewels, adorned with sapphires and diamonds, radiating the lights of all jewels, filling the cosmos, showing therein all buddhas and enlightening beings. This is the seventy-fourth.
“Buddha’s right palm has a mark of greatness called cloud of radiance, adorned with a thousand-spoked diamond wheel, emanating jewel light whirling to the right filling the cosmos, showing therein all buddhas, each buddhas’ body blazing with flames of light, teaching the truth and liberating people, purifying worlds. This is the seventy-fifth.
“Buddha’s left palm has a mark of greatness called cloud of flaming wheels, expanding and magically causing all the sites of enlightenment in the cosmos to appear, adorned with a thousand-spoked wheel of sunlike jewels, radiating great beams of light filling all oceans of worlds, revealing therein all enlightening beings, expounding the ocean of practices of Universal Good, entering into all buddhas’ lands, each enlightening innumerable sentient beings. This is the seventy-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rim pa g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'od rab tu gsal ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i me tog chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i 'od nam mkha' lta bu rin po che thams cad kyi 'od du snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhi thams cad la rab tu gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan du rin po che'i 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab cing rab tu snang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kun tu snang ba'i klong sna tshogs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s genital organ has a mark of greatness called cloud emanating the voice of Buddha, adorned with all kinds of fine jewels, emitting flowery flame light from crystal lamps, the light refulgent, containing the colors of all jewels, illuminating all universes in space, showing therein all buddhas traveling, coming and going, reaching everywhere. This is the seventy-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g.yas pa la sems can thams cad kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing / rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam par snang bas/ phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kun nas khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / mtshan gcig pa rgya mtsho'i sprin las/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan khongs su chud pa'i gzhi'i mtshan nyid kyis rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma dang / phreng ba kun tu khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right buttock has a mark of greatness called cloud of radiant garlands of jewel lamps, adorned with jewels, emitting inconceivable jewel flame rays of light spreading throughout all universes in the ten directions, being of the same one appearance as the cosmos of space, yet able to produce all appearances, manifesting in each appearance the autonomous mystical projections of the buddhas. This is the seventy-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g.yon pa la rin po che'i pad+mo rnam par dag pa pad+mo'i mdog dang / kha dog gi 'od zer rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu thams cad du rab tu mched pa'i 'khor lo/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi la kun nas bzhugs pa'i mtshan gyi sprin yang dag par bstan pa phyogs su mched cing rab tu byung ba'i 'od zer gyi dra bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun nas khyab par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left buttock has a mark of greatness called cloud of light covering the sky showing all oceans of universes like lotuses, adorned with pure jewels, emanating networks of light rays illumining all universes in the ten directions, revealing there clouds of all kinds of forms. This is the seventy-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs brla g.yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang / chos kyi 'od kyi spos rin po che rab tu bkye bas/ rim gyis mtho bar gnas shing ran pas rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho sprin mdzes pa/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la mnyam par kun tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right thigh has a mark of greatness called cloud of ubiquitous manifestation, adorned with crystals of many colors. The thigh is proportionate to the calf; it radiates lights of the true Teaching, like jewel flames, able to instantly reveal the ocean of forms of the striding of the king of all treasures. This is the eightieth.

sangs rgyas kyi zhabs brla g.yon pa la rin po che rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i gzhi'i chos rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pas rab tu brgyan cing / zhabs kyi gshegs stabs rnam par bkod kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung zhing / sems can thams cad la rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa rgya mtsho skye ba'i 'od zer tshad med pa rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left thigh has a mark of greatness called cloud showing the infinite oceans of features of all buddhas, adorned with an ocean of all jewels resting on each one, traveling vast distances, emanating pure light shining on all sentient beings, causing them all to seek the supreme state of buddhahood. This is the eighty-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs byin pa g.yas pa ri e na ya'i byin pa lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od zer gyi me tog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu snang zhing gshegs stabs thams cad la/ 'od zer zhing thams cad yongs su skyod pa/ kun tu gsung gi dbyangs rab tu 'gyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi gzhi'i sgra 'byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa byung ba'i 'od zhing thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings su rnam par snang zhing / rin po che'i 'od 'phro bas kun tu brgyan pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i zhing du byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i snying po chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s deerlike right calf has a mark of greatness called cloud of all universes in space, adorned with sublime jewels of light. The calf is round and straight and walks well; it emanates pure golden light illuminating all buddhas’ worlds and emits great sounds causing them all to quake. It also shows all buddha-lands stationed in space, arrayed with jewel-like flames, from which countless enlightening beings magically appear. This is the eighty-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs byin pa g.yon pa ri e na ya'i byin pa lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ gser kha dog bzang po ltar shin tu 'od 'bar ba'i 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi 'od du rtag tu 'byung ba gshegs stabs thams cad kyi zhabs kyi 'og na/ zhing thams cad rab tu gnas te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i dbyings kyis rgyas par khebs shing / sangs rgyas phal po che'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s deerlike left calf has a mark of greatness called cloud of oceans of adornments. Golden-hued, it can walk through all buddha-lands, emitting the pure light of all jewels, filling the cosmos, given to perform buddha-works. This is the eighty-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs byin pa'i spu yan lag gyen du gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod phyogs thams cad du rab tu bkye bas/ phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'od zer gyi dra ba gcig tu gyur pa'i spu las sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad bstan pa spu thams cad kyi nang du zhing gi gzugs brnyan thams cad khongs su chud par ston pas/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'od rab tu snang ba yongs su ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The jewel hair on the Buddha’s lower legs has a mark of greatness called cloud of manifestations of reflected images of the cosmos. The hair curls to the right, and each hairtip radiates jewel light filling all universes in the ten directions, showing all buddhas’ spiritual powers. The hair pores all emit lights in which appear all buddha-lands. This is the eighty-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'od zer gyi dra bas phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin gyi me tog kun tu rgyas par rin po che'i spos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i ri las/ 'khor gyi gzhi thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang / spos thams cad dang / rin po che'i kha dog thams cad rtag tu bkye bas/ zhabs kyi mthil gshegs stabs gcig tu bor bas kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi klong gi rgyud thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The soles of Buddha’s feet have a mark of greatness called cloud of arrangements of the ocean of all enlightening beings, diamond-colored, with pure lotus blossoms of gold, radiating jewel-like light illumining all oceans of worlds in the ten directions, with clouds of jewel-like fragrant flames reaching everywhere. When he lifts his foot to take a step, a fragrant air circulates, replete with the colors of all jewels, filling the cosmos. This is the eighty-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi bol la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'bar bas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang chen po yang dag par ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyi 'od kun tu rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“On Buddha’s right instep is a mark of greatness called cloud of light shining on everything, adorned with all kinds of jewels, radiating great lights filling the cosmos, showing all buddhas and enlightening beings. This is the eighty-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi sor mo'i mtshams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i mtshan nyid kyis bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'bar bas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i 'od sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad du snang ba las/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed cing / snying po byang chub thams cad kyi sgo ston pa/ kun tu snang bas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun tu khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“On Buddha’s left instep is a mark of greatness called cloud of manifestations of all buddhas, adorned with jewels, emanating jewel light moment to moment showing the miraculous displays of all buddhas, as well as their oceans of teachings, and the enlightenment sites they sit at, this continuing unbroken forever. This is the eighty-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthil la/ rin po che mi phyed pa'i gzhi nor bu'i rgyal po/ ri rab mar me'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bsod nams kyi 'od zer las byung ba/ rtsibs stong dang ldan pa rgyan gzhan dang gzhan ston pas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad du khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi sprin gyi klong rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas shin tu bstan pa'i snying po can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dbyings kyis shin tu rgyas pa/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'od kyi dra bas rnam par snang bar mdzad pa/ rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu snang bar sprin gyi 'khor lo'i gnas mtha' yas pas spos thams cad kyi dri yongs su 'phro ba'i sgron ma rin po che'i rgyal pos kun tu brgyan cing rin po che sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis gzhi rnam par dag pas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad du snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Between Buddha’s right toes is a mark of greatness called cloud of light illuminating all oceans of universes, variously adorned with diamonds like mountainous lamps and thousand-spoked wheels of flames, radiating great beams of light filling the oceans of worlds in all universes in the ten directions, showing therein the various forms of precious adornments of all buddhas. This is the eighty-eighth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthil la nam mkha' ltar kun tu rnam par dag pa'i rin po che rgya mtsho yongs su snang bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i skye bo thams cad la rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi sgron ma'i phreng ba dang / 'khor los phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin shin tu 'phags pas yongs su gang ba'i sprin gyi sgra/ dpal gyi be'u dang / mdzod spu'i dbyibs kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba kun tu 'phel ba'i 'od kyi dbyings su ston cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sprin kun tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Between Buddha’s left toes is a mark of greatness called cloud showing the ocean of all buddhas, adorned with jewel flowers, garlands of fragrant flaming lamps, and discs of all jewels, constantly emitting pure lights from an ocean of jewels, filling space, reaching all worlds in the ten directions, showing therein such features of all buddhas and enlightening beings as their universal voices and their mystic gammadion signs of felicity, benefiting all the infinite sentient beings. This is the eighty-ninth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi bol gyi logs g.yas pa la sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par snang ba thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs dang / rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i mdog rnam pa sna tshogs su yongs su dag par chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ston cing snying po byang chub kyi gdan yongs su ston pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dbyings rin po che'i 'od zer 'dzin pa rab tu bkye bas yongs su rgyas shing / mtshan nyid gcig pas chos kyi dbyings ma 'dres par rgyan gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right heel has a mark of greatness called cloud of independent radiance, adorned with powdered sapphires, always emanating the exquisite jewel light of the buddhas, the splendor of that light filling the cosmos, all the same one appearance, without any differences, therein showing all buddhas sitting at the site of enlightenment and expounding the sublime teaching. This is the ninetieth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthil rting pa logs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba'i mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bkod pa la kun nas 'jug pa'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho dang / rin po che dang spos kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho dang / ri rab rin po che me tog bai DUr+ya sna tshogs ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi byas pa; chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sprul pa'i rgyud kyis yongs su khebs par mdzad cing / rang rang gi chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrar sgrog pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left heel has a mark of greatness called cloud manifesting sublime voices expounding the ocean of truths, adorned with jewels from the ocean of mystic projections, jewels from flowers of a polar mountain in an ocean of fragrant flames, as well as cat’s-eye gems, all radiating great beams of light filling the cosmos, showing therein the spiritual powers of the buddhas. This is the ninety-first.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che'i gzhi sna tshogs shin tu zab pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par snang zhing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi 'od lta bur snang bas phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang bar mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ri rab kyi sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan thams cad yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s right ankle has a mark of greatness called cloud shining with the light of all adornments, with extremely fine adornments made of all kinds of precious substances, radiating pure golden light, illumining all universes in the ten directions, the light appearing as an enormous cloud covering the sites of enlightenment of all buddhas. This is the ninety-second.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang ba zla ba dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro bas shin tu brgyan pa'i snying po can/ in+d+ra nI la'i dra bas gzhi kun nas brgyan par chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i sprin/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba lta bu'i sprin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i kha dog 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan du shin tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“Buddha’s left ankle has a mark of greatness called cloud showing all colors, adorned with radiant jewels and sapphires containing the glow of all moons, moment to moment traveling through the ocean of universes, radiating crystal lamps’ fragrant flames’ light, that light pervading all universes. This is the ninety-third.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ nam mkha'i dbyings su rin po che'i sprin snang ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la/ sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs shing mdzod spu dang / rin po che'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rab tu bstan pa'i 'od gzhi kun tu khyab pa/ rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la'i tshon lta bus rab tu brgyan pa'i sprin kun tu mched pa zhes bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The circumference of Buddha’s right foot has a mark of greatness called universal treasury cloud, adorned with emeralds and diamonds, emanating jewel light filling space, therein showing all buddhas sitting on crystal lion thrones at the sites of enlightenment. This is the ninety-fourth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'bar zhing snang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings zab mo'i gsung shin tu 'phags pa/ chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i sprin gyi me tog rin po che'i ze ba can yongs su rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya mtsho rgyas par khyab pa'i sprin mtshan nyid gcig pa rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa mi zad pa'i rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhir thug par kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The circumference of Buddha’s left foot has a mark of greatness called cloud of light illumining the whole cosmos, adorned with jewel flowers, radiating great lights filling the cosmos, all equal and uniform, therein showing the mystic power of all the buddhas and enlightening beings, with great wondrous voices expounding the endless ways of entry into truth there are in the cosmos. This is the ninety-fifth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gser rnam par dag cing yid du 'ong ba kha dog bzang po'i sprin/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi 'od zer las sangs rgyas kyi sprin kun tu khyab pa zhing gi rgyud dang / klong rnam par bkod par rnam par 'phrul zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba rgya mtsho'i gzhir thug pa mi zad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang / mthu phyogs su kun tu rnam par snang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i snying po la klong med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ rin po che'i sprin du snang ba'i rgyan rab tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o/ /

“The tips of Buddha’s right toes have a mark of greatness called cloud showing adornments, arrayed with very pleasing pure gold, emanating great rays of light filling all universes in the ten directions, showing therein the boundless ocean of teachings, various virtues, and spiritual powers of all buddhas and enlightening beings. This is the ninety-sixth.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer zla ba 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can/ rin po che'i rgyal po kun tu dri zhim zhing 'od 'byung ba'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gzhi rin po che'i 'khor lo thams cad du 'byung ba sna tshogs rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang; mdog dang / 'od zer gyi 'khor lo khongs su chud pa'i gzhir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho khongs su chud par rnam par snang zhing 'bar bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ston pa'i sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sprin gyi sgra'i nga ro rab tu gtong bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthil la mtshan thams cad kyi rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rab tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ste/

“The tips of Buddha’s left toes have a mark of greatness called cloud showing the mystic transformations of all buddhas, adorned with inconceivable buddhas’ halos, moon glow, pervasive perfume, and wheels of jewel flames, emanating pure lights of the colors of all jewels, filling all oceans of worlds, showing therein all buddhas and enlightening beings expounding the ocean of all Buddha teachings. This is the ninety-seventh.

de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad ni de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mang po'i sprin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rgya mtsho phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ni rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mtshan rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /
“Vairocana Buddha has as many such marks of greatness as atoms in ten Flower Treasury oceans of worlds, each limb adorned with sublime marks of myriad jewels.”
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan rgya mtsho bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu pa'o// //
[41. dpe byad bzang po'i 'od zer bstan pa'i le'u]
BOOK THIRTY-FIVE. The Qualities of the Buddha’s Embellishments and Lights
bam po drug cu rtsa brgyad pa/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rin po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ dpe byad bzang po 'od 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba mnga' ste/ de las 'od zer bar chad med par shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bdun cu dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ de nam [*na ma?] byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas rang gi lus 'dor ba de'i tshe/ 'od zer dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gtong ste; de 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu snang bar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar byed do/ /de dag tu sems can ji snyed skyes pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar byed de/ de dag gis kyang snang ba de mthong zhing shes te/ sems can de dag gi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag gi mig yongs su sbyang ba rnam pa bcu yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yongs su spyang ba dag kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba pa de dag kyang dga' ba dang nyams bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba de dag nas shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der skyes nas kyang lha'i rnga rga ba med pa zhes bya ba sgra 'byin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /kye grogs po dag /bag yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs kyis 'dir skyes so/ /de nyid kyi phyir sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthus lha'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes so/ /

THEN THE WORLD HONORED ONE said to the enlightening being Jewel Hand, “Offspring of Buddha, the perfectly enlightened one has an embellishment called the foremost sphere, from which emanates a great light called effulgence, with seven million infinities of light rays. When I was an enlightening being in the palace of Tushita heaven, I emanated a great light called lightbanner king, illuminating as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-lands; the sentient beings in the hells of those worlds who were touched by this light gained respite from their torments, and they obtained ten kinds of pure eyes, ears, noses, tongues, bodies, and minds, and all danced for joy. When their lives ended they were reborn in Tushita heaven. In Tushita heaven is a drum called most delightful; when they had been born in heaven, this drum sounded, declaring to them, ‘O godlings, because your minds were not indulgent and you planted roots of goodness in the presence of buddhas, and because in the past you associated with the wise, and by the great spiritual power of Vairocana, you have been born in this heaven after the end of your life elsewhere.’
